title: Saving water in the driest place on Earth
description: How do farmers in the driest place on Earth manage to grow crops? With this solution!

vocabItems.definition: remove the liquid from something by pouring it out or letting it flow away
stick or hold onto something very tightly
make something start to happen or develop more quickly
at some unspecified point in the future
(idiom) the real results of something happening now will not be known until some time in the future
